answers.answer: Well I'll be darned... I never KNEW that...LoLYou'd THINK that Freezing it would kill the virus... or screw up the count??Wonder if this means that Hep survives being frozen... or are they counting DEAD virus... to get the VL...I'm on a roll with my... Hummmmmms!!!LoL;)

Hey VIc, how's it going?  For what it's worth, I thought my samples were frozen because they were sent to California, not because of the type of test.  So, did you make it to the lab for the PCR test?  Inquiring minds want to know.  How long before the results are in?I worry some about that onset of type 2 diabetes too, but I don't think I have ever tested high. Guess I will check on that in the fall when I have a physical.  I thought my post tx weight gain was due to lack of motivation -- still do.  But I just can't figure out why I can't motivate.Hope all is well in the great northwest.bean

WOW, I didn't know that either! You and yur hmmmmms, I get on research kicks too at times...cracks me up how so many of us do that..LOL!!Sorry to see you worrying about the thyroid and glucose stuff. You'll be ina special prayer tonight...let everyone know the results k???     -MkeelaP.S. posted to ya below before I read this...(((((((tator)))))))

They freeze the PCR every time for me - I believe it has something to do with the way it coagulates with the mixture they spin it at - and that is how they come to a correct count.I'll ask the phleb next time for sure.But it will be a long wait - cause I don't test again for 3 months.

Elaine..LoL.... well... I feel pretty stupid about not knowing about the frozen blood... just never really thought about it I guess... at my old doc in Ga... they just came to your exam room & drew the blood & stuck it in a little wire basket that stood the vials up... & I never saw it again... so it just never occurred to me, However it would still be interesting to know if the dang Hep virus survives FREEZING though...On this other stuff.... I suppose it could be NEITHER... so until I get the actual results its speculating... I just never would have even considered diabetic....I'll just be glad to figure out what the heck has caused that sudden weight gain.. it was like 50 lbs in 4 months... If I'd of only been contending with 10, or even 20... it wouldn't have been near as unsettling ...I do know that when I skip my B12 injections.. I have NO Energy.. so maybe my b12 is masking some symptoms ...Goofers...Ya know... at this point I don't think I even care what they find... I just want what ever it is identified so I can fix or maintain what-ever is going on... shish..I guess sometimes it takes something like this to discover what is going on (like when I went to the doc to quit smoking & discovered Hep C instead).. so maybe all this is good & in the long run, I'll be better off for having discovered it... vs leaving something unknown untreated!MKeela...Holy Cow Woman.. West Nile... That's something you read about & never think anyone you ever know will become affected.. WoW... I'll return the favor & say a special prayer for you tonight too... Thanks !!!!Bean,I didn't yet... but will soon..Honey..LoL... not MY fault their dang freezer was broke.. Ha!Golden...WoW.. You Too..??Well I think my blood pressure was actually GOOD... it was 112 over 68 (so at least I was CALM)...LoLI haven't had a chance to really research any of this yet, but plan to tonight.... I guess if it does turn out to be a glucose thing... it would be due to the past gestational problemo... I'll learn more about those numbers... & what they mean tonight!I got bummed today though because my better half (who does have thyroid problems) got his blood work done yesterday too .. & his was already back... ... guess it took longer for mine because of the additional test.....Grrr... I HATE WAITING!!!Ya'll,Well there will be NO dieting tomorrow by golly.... I am going to be eating my (Bad Carbs)... I am fixing RIBS, Potato Salad, Corn On The Cob.. & I REFUSE To Feel Guilty ... now at the end of the week I may get some post guilt... but for now I am not gonna think or worry about it till I get some kind of dang diagnosis... do you know it has almost been a year since AI have enjoyed potato salad... This just ain't right... I really miss my BAD Foods sometimes... Ha!Hey.... Have a Happy 4th Ya'll.. & eat some extra bad food for me...LoLNaa, seriously.. I hope everyone treating gets to enjoy at least minimal sxs tomorrow!;)

LOL you crazy lady,,,now you have everyone in this thread going Hummm!!No PCR....Shame on you!!  You need that PCR to get it done,,,sealed and delivered!Let us know on TSH levels,,,could be diabetic and not realize.  That would explain alot of weight gain that you have had even when you were on a strict diet!

I m also now having to watch my glucose now before tx it was 99 or below now  almost 8 months off tx the lowest has been 105 fasting im also having blood pressure issues..now i think im going to have to work on losing weight hmmmmmm really hate this.........................

At first glance I thought you posted 'Things that go hummmm'. Oh well.Sorry that you continue to have health woes. I really hope these things will fade away and see you enjoying the good health you deserve.Take care, Tate.

I Will.... I'm on a Role with Good Medical Results... so It's bound to be All Good!... I feel like I have it made in the shade Now!See upper thread... I am NOT a diabetic, & thyroid is obviously not burned out either... so I guess I'll be a happy fat person!I'll probably go next Monday or Tuesday!:)

question: Things that make you go Hummmm,Have ya'll ever heard of.... or did you know.... that when you go for your blood draw for a PCR, that the sample is FROZEN?????Just wondered if anyone ever heard of that or knew That????(Or was there a MISTAKE)...????I went yesterday to have all my bloodwork done for PCR & Thyroid,Well.... I wound up NOT getting the PCR because when the gal went t draw the sample for it in the Drs office.... she had to call the lab to find out which "Vial" to use... & was told the "Purple ICE"... I was sitting there thinking... HUH....(I could have told her it was the BIG Tube, & that it had a purple stopper in the end) well, (but that's about ALL I knew) She said that they couldn't do my sample because it has to be frozen & sent to the lab, & that their freezer in their little fridge was broken... so I would have to go directly to the lab & have That particular blood draw done .... so I have the slip, & I will still go within a week or so... I just didn't have time to run across town & make yet another stop yesterday!I just thought that was interesting, & I had never heard that before... or didn't KNOW... so makes me wonder if that was correct is all... Humm!!Okay, another Hummmmmmmm!!When I consulted & inquired about the thyroid test... another interesting tidbit came up... the fact that I had gestation diabetes way back when I was prego with my kids... I was informed that 40% of women that had gestation diabetes wind up with adult type 2 diabetes... & that being a diabetic could ALSO cause this massive weight gain that I experienced after coming off of TX... & that it would also explain the "NOT" being able to loose the weight either,,.???How Odd!!!Soooo, they ran a check for that too along with the TSH & T4 uptake!!!I'm kind of stumped by this...I mean I pretty much eat a diabetic diet now, ... I watch the carbs, & calories... & make sure that any carbs consumed are only Good Clean Carbs... everything I do is pretty much based on the glycemic index...Makes me wonder "If" I turn out to be diabetic... does this mean I will stay fat.. shishHumm, First my Dog.. Now Me..??? How weird would THAT be..??I'm still CONVINCED it has to be my Thyroid.. & not this diabetic stuff... I mean I have no signs... & If gestational diabetes is known to take a turn... wouldn't it have happened LONG before now... I mean my Youngest Child is 19 now.. plus I don't have any signs (that I know of)...Shish!Which would be worse..?? Kind of feels like Pick your Poison.. I think I am just SHOCKED that it was even suggested, I just never would have suspected!!!Anyway, guess I'll know more in 3 or 4 days... just thought it was all rather interesting... & I guess next week I'll drag myself down to the lab for that PCR!Guuurrrr!!!;)P.S... If this lands on the wrong side... I am sorry... the drop down doesn't have an entry for "COMMUNITY"
title: Hope This Lands On The Right Side
